tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_marketing_lists(
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address VARCHAR(255),
    behavior_track_1 VARCHAR(255),
    behavior_track_2 VARCHAR(255)
)
CREATE TABLE user_behavior (id INT, user_id INT, email VARCHAR(255), behavior_type VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE email_lists (list_id INT, list_name VARCHAR(100), segment_criteria VARCHAR(255), created_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE email_subscriptions (subscription_id INT, user_id INT, list_id INT, subscription_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (campaign_id INT, name VARCHAR(100), list_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE);
